page.title: 08SCHOOL - 1985 by a 10 yr old
page.content: I get to school by minibus. We play in the playground until the Deputy Head claps . It's my job with 3 friends to take class 3 in. We do this duty every playtime and at lunch if it is wet.I do not like school dinners so I take a packed lunch. The lessons we have are O.K. I like maths and handwriting. Language is a bit boring sometimes. Another teacher takes us for netball and a retired man takes the boys for football. I am the reserve for the 'A' team netball. Every term we do projects. Last term's project was minibeasts and we made some large models of some of them. This term's projects are The Middle Ages and the Domesday Survey. Other lessons are music,P.E., art/craft. We watch one or two schools' T.V. programmes.
